verses.verse: מַה־ <WH4100> How יָּפ֧וּ <WH3303> beautiful פְעָמַ֛יִךְ <WH6471> are thy feet בַּנְּעָלִ֖ים <WH5275> with shoes בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter נָדִ֑יב <WH5081> O prince's חַמּוּקֵ֣י <WH2542> the joints יְרֵכַ֔יִךְ <WH3409> of thy thighs כְּמ֣וֹ <WH3644> are like חֲלָאִ֔ים <WH2481> [are] like jewels מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> the work יְדֵ֥י <WH3027> of the hands אָמָּֽן׃ <WH542> of a cunning workman

שָׁרְרֵךְ֙ <WH8326> Thy navel אַגַּ֣ן <WH101> goblet הַסַּ֔הַר <WH5469> [is like] a round אַל־ <WH408> never יֶחְסַ֖ר <WH2637> [which] wanteth הַמָּ֑זֶג <WH4197> not liquor בִּטְנֵךְ֙ <WH990> thy belly עֲרֵמַ֣ת <WH6194> [is like] an heap חִטִּ֔ים <WH2406> of wheat סוּגָ֖ה <WH5473> set about בַּשּׁוֹשַׁנִּֽים׃ <WH7799> with lilies
שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> Thy two שָׁדַ֛יִךְ <WH7699> breasts כִּשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> [are] like two עֳפָרִ֖ים <WH6082> young תָּאֳמֵ֥י <WH8380> [that are] twins צְבִיָּֽה׃ <WH6646> roes

צַוָּארֵ֖ךְ <WH6677> Thy neck כְּמִגְדַּ֣ל <WH4026> [is] as a tower הַשֵּׁ֑ן <WH8127> of ivory עֵינַ֜יִךְ <WH5869> thine eyes בְּרֵכ֣וֹת <WH1295> [like] the fishpools בְּחֶשְׁבּ֗וֹן <WH2809> in Heshbon עַל־ <WH5921> By שַׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> by the gate בַּת־ רַבִּ֔ים <WH1337> of Bathrabbim אַפֵּךְ֙ <WH639> thy nose כְּמִגְדַּ֣ל <WH4026> [is] as the tower הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon צוֹפֶ֖ה <WH6822> which looketh פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> toward דַמָּֽשֶׂק׃ <WH1834> Damascus

רֹאשֵׁ֤ךְ <WH7218> Thine head עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> crowns כַּכַּרְמֶ֔ל <WH3760> upon thee [is] like Carmel וְדַלַּ֥ת <WH1803> and the hair רֹאשֵׁ֖ךְ <WH7218> of thine head כָּאַרְגָּמָ֑ן <WH713> like purple מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אָס֥וּר <WH631> [is] held בָּרְהָטִֽים׃ <WH7298> in the galleries
מַה־ <WH4100> How יָּפִית֙ <WH3302> How fair וּמַה־ <WH4100> and how נָּעַ֔מְתְּ <WH5276> and how pleasant אַהֲבָ֖ה <WH160> art thou O love בַּתַּֽעֲנוּגִֽים׃ <WH8588> for delights
זֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise קֽוֹמָתֵךְ֙ <WH6967> This thy stature דָּֽמְתָ֣ה <WH1819> is like לְתָמָ֔ר <WH8558> to a palm tree וְשָׁדַ֖יִךְ <WH7699> and thy breasts לְאַשְׁכֹּלֽוֹת׃ <WH811> to clusters

אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> I said אֶעֱלֶ֣ה <WH5927> I will go up בְתָמָ֔ר <WH8558> to the palm tree אֹֽחֲזָ֖ה <WH270> I will take hold בְּסַנְסִנָּ֑יו <WH5577> of the boughs וְיִֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> become נָ֤א <WH4994> may שָׁדַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH7699> thereof now also thy breasts כְּאֶשְׁכְּל֣וֹת <WH811> shall be as clusters הַגֶּ֔פֶן <WH1612> of the vine וְרֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> and the smell אַפֵּ֖ךְ <WH639> of thy nose כַּתַּפּוּחִֽים׃ <WH8598> like apples

וְחִכֵּ֕ךְ <WH2441> And the roof of thy mouth כְּיֵ֥ין <WH3196> wine הַטּ֛וֹב <WH2896> like the best הוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> that goeth לְדוֹדִ֖י <WH1730> for my beloved לְמֵישָׁרִ֑ים <WH4339> [down] sweetly דּוֹבֵ֖ב <WH1680> to speak שִׂפְתֵ֥י <WH8193> causing the lips יְשֵׁנִֽים׃ <WH3462> grow old
אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am לְדוֹדִ֔י <WH1730> I [am] my beloved's וְעָלַ֖י <WH5921> and תְּשׁוּקָתֽוֹ׃ <WH8669> and his desire ס
לְכָ֤ה <WH1980> Come דוֹדִי֙ <WH1730> my beloved נֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> let us go forth הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> into the field נָלִ֖ינָה <WH3885> let us lodge בַּכְּפָרִֽים׃ <WH3723> in the villages

נַשְׁכִּ֙ימָה֙ <WH7925> Let us get up early לַכְּרָמִ֔ים <WH3754> to the vineyards נִרְאֶ֞ה <WH7200> let us see אִם <WH518> whether פָּֽרְחָ֤ה <WH6524> flourish הַגֶּ֙פֶן֙ <WH1612> if the vine פִּתַּ֣ח <WH6605> appear הַסְּמָדַ֔ר <WH5563> [whether] the tender grape הֵנֵ֖צוּ <WH5132> bud forth הָרִמּוֹנִ֑ים <WH7416> [and] the pomegranates שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> There אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> there will I give אֶת־ <WH853> דֹּדַ֖י <WH1730> thee my loves

לָֽךְ׃ הַֽדּוּדָאִ֣ים <WH1736> The mandrakes נָֽתְנוּ־ <WH5414> give רֵ֗יחַ <WH7381> a smell וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over פְּתָחֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH6607> and at our gates כָּל־ <WH3605> are all מְגָדִ֔ים <WH4022> [are] all manner of pleasant חֲדָשִׁ֖ים <WH2319> [fruits] new גַּם־ <WH1571> again יְשָׁנִ֑ים <WH3465> and old דּוֹדִ֖י <WH1730> for thee O my beloved צָפַ֥נְתִּי <WH6845> [which] I have laid up לָֽךְ׃
